00014 #include "freqest.h"
00015 #include "matrix.h"
00016 #include <numeric>
00017 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix_proxy.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/io.hpp>
00019 
00020 void
00021 FreqEstimation::genSpectrum(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin,
00022         std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memout,
00023         int t0, double tol, FFT::twindowfunc windowfunc, double windowlength) {
00024     int t = memin.size();
00025     int n = memout.size();
00026     
00027     if(t > 1024)
00028         throw XKameError(i18n("Too large size to allocate a matrix."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00029     
00030     int wpoints = lrint(numberOfNoises(memin)); //# of fittable data in freq. domain.
00031     wpoints = std::min(std::max(wpoints, t/100 + 1), t);
00032 //  fprintf(stderr, "# of data points = %d\n", wpoints);
00033     
00034     double tpoworg = 0.0;
00035     for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00036         tpoworg += std::norm(memin[i]);
00037     }
00038 
00039     std::vector<std::complex<double> > rx(t);
00040     autoCorrelation(memin, rx);
00041     //# of signal space.
00042     int p = t; // / 2 - 1;
00043     rx.resize(p);
00044     // Correlation matrix.
00045     ublas::matrix<std::complex<double> > r(p, p);
00046     for(int i = 0; i < p; i++) {
00047         ublas::matrix_row<ublas::matrix<std::complex<double> > > rrow(r, i);
00048         for(int j = i; j < p; j++) {
00049             rrow(j) = rx[j - i];
00050         }
00051     }
00052     ublas::matrix<std::complex<double> > eigv;
00053     ublas::vector<double> lambda;
00054     double tol_lambda = tol * std::abs(rx[0]) * 0.1;
00055     eigHermiteRRR(r, lambda, eigv, tol_lambda);
00056 
00057     //# of signals.
00058     int numsig = 0;
00059     if(!m_mvdl_method) {
00060         //Minimum IC.
00061         double minic = 1e99;
00062         double sumlambda = 0.0, sumloglambda = 1.0;
00063         for(int i = 0; i < p; i++) {
00064             sumlambda += lambda[i];
00065             sumloglambda += log(lambda[i]);
00066             int q = p - 1 - i;
00067             double logl = t * (p - q) * (sumloglambda / (double)(p - q) - log(sumlambda / (double)(p - q)));
00068             double ic = m_funcIC(logl, q * (2*p - q), wpoints);
00069             if(ic < minic) {
00070                 minic = ic;
00071                 numsig = q;
00072             }
00073         }
00074         numsig *= windowlength;
00075         numsig = std::max(std::min(numsig, p - 1), 0);
00076         
00077 //      fprintf(stderr, "MinIC=%g, # of signal=%d, p=%d\n", minic, numsig, p);
00078 
00079 //      std::cout << lambda << std::endl;
00080 //      std::cout << eigv << std::endl;
00081     }
00082     std::vector<std::complex<double> > fftin(t, 0.0), fftout(t), acsum(t, 0.0);
00083     for(int i = 0; i < p - numsig; i++) {
00084         ublas::matrix_column<ublas::matrix<std::complex<double> > > eigvcol(eigv, i);
00085         ASSERT(fabs(norm_2(eigvcol) - 1.0) < 0.1);
00086         for(int j = 0; j < p; j++) {
00087             fftin[j] = eigvcol(j);
00088         }
00089         autoCorrelation(fftin, fftout);
00090         double z = lambda[i];
00091         z = std::max(z, tol_lambda);
00092         z = (m_eigenvalue_method) ? (1.0 / z) : 1.0;
00093         for(int k = 0; k < p; k++) {
00094             acsum[k] += fftout[k] * z;
00095         }
00096     }
00097     std::vector<std::complex<double> > zffftin(n, 0.0), zffftout(n);
00098     std::vector<double> ip(n), dy(n);
00099     acsum[0] /= (double)2;
00100     std::copy(acsum.begin(), acsum.end(), zffftin.begin());
00101     m_ifftN->exec(zffftin, zffftout);
00102     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00103         ip[i] = std::real(zffftout[i]);
00104     for(int i = 0; i < p; i++)
00105         zffftin[i] = (double)((i >= n/2) ? (i - n) : i) * acsum[i] * std::complex<double>(0, 1);
00106     m_ifftN->exec(zffftin, zffftout);
00107     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00108         dy[i] = std::real(zffftout[i]);
00109     
00110     //Power spectrum density.
00111     std::vector<double> psd(n);
00112     double tpow = 0.0;
00113     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00114         double z = 1.0 / ip[i];
00115         tpow += z;
00116         psd[i] = z;
00117     }
00118     double normalize = n * tpoworg / tpow;
00119     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00120         psd[i] *= normalize;
00121     }
00122     //Least-Square Phase Estimation.
00123     double coeff = lspe(memin, t0, psd, memout, tol, true, windowfunc); 
00124     normalize *= coeff * coeff;
00125     
00126     //Peak detection. Sub-resolution detection for smooth curves.
00127     for(int ip = 0; ip < n; ip++) {
00128         int in = (ip + 1) % n;
00129         if((dy[ip] < 0) && (dy[in] > 0)) {
00130             double dx = - dy[ip] / (dy[in] - dy[ip]);
00131             if((dx >= 0) && (dx <= 1.0)) {
00132                 std::complex<double> z = 0.0, xn = 1.0,
00133                     x = std::polar(1.0, 2 * M_PI * (dx + ip) / (double)n);
00134                 for(int j = 0; j < p; j++) {
00135                     z += acsum[j] * xn;
00136                     xn *= x;
00137                 }
00138                 double r = sqrt(normalize * std::max(1.0 / std::real(z), 0.0));
00139                 m_peaks.push_back(std::pair<double, double>(r, dx + ip));
00140             }
00141         }
00142     }
00143 }
Generated on Fri Oct 23 19:05:53 2009 for KAME2 by  1.5.6
